翻译引擎 (Engines)

本部分包含翻译引擎的基类以及所有内置的引擎实现。

引擎基类

本模块定义了所有翻译引擎插件必须继承的抽象基类（ABC）。 v3.0.2.dev 更新：引入速率限制和并发控制。

class trans_hub.engines.base.BaseContextModel[源代码]

基类：BaseModel

引擎特定上下文的基础模型。

model_config: ClassVar[ConfigDict] = {}

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

class trans_hub.engines.base.BaseEngineConfig(*, rpm: int | None = None, rps: int | None = None, max_concurrency: int | None = None, max_batch_size: int = 50)[源代码]

基类：BaseModel

所有引擎配置模型的基类，提供了通用的速率与并发控制选项。

rpm: int | None
rps: int | None
max_concurrency: int | None
max_batch_size: int
model_config: ClassVar[ConfigDict] = {}

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

class trans_hub.engines.base.BaseTranslationEngine(config: _ConfigType)[源代码]

基类：ABC, Generic[_ConfigType]

翻译引擎的纯异步抽象基类，内置速率限制和并发控制。

CONFIG_MODEL: type[_ConfigType]
CONTEXT_MODEL

BaseContextModel 的别名

VERSION: str = '1.0.0'
REQUIRES_SOURCE_LANG: bool = False
ACCEPTS_CONTEXT: bool = False
__init__(config: _ConfigType)[源代码]
async initialize() → None[源代码]

引擎的异步初始化钩子，用于设置连接池等。

async close() → None[源代码]

引擎的异步关闭钩子，用于安全释放资源。

validate_and_parse_context(context_dict: dict[str, Any] | None) → BaseContextModel | EngineError[源代码]
async atranslate_batch(texts: list[str], target_lang: str, source_lang: str | None = None, context: BaseContextModel | None = None) → list[EngineSuccess | EngineError][源代码]

内置引擎

提供一个使用 translators 库的免费翻译引擎。

provider: str | None
model_config: ClassVar[ConfigDict] = {}

class trans_hub.engines.translators_engine.TranslatorsEngineConfig(*, rpm: int | None = None, rps: int | None = None, max_concurrency: int | None = None, max_batch_size: int = 50, provider: str = 'google')[源代码]

model: str | None
temperature: float | None

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

class trans_hub.engines.openai.OpenAIEngineConfig(_case_sensitive: bool | None = None, _nested_model_default_partial_update: bool | None = None, _env_prefix: str | None = None, _env_file: DotenvType | None = PosixPath('.'), _env_file_encoding: str | None = None, _env_ignore_empty: bool | None = None, _env_nested_delimiter: str | None = None, _env_nested_max_split: int | None = None, _env_parse_none_str: str | None = None, _env_parse_enums: bool | None = None, _cli_prog_name: str | None = None, _cli_parse_args: bool | list[str] | tuple[str, ...] | None = None, _cli_settings_source: CliSettingsSource[Any] | None = None, _cli_parse_none_str: str | None = None, _cli_hide_none_type: bool | None = None, _cli_avoid_json: bool | None = None, _cli_enforce_required: bool | None = None, _cli_use_class_docs_for_groups: bool | None = None, _cli_exit_on_error: bool | None = None, _cli_prefix: str | None = None, _cli_flag_prefix_char: str | None = None, _cli_implicit_flags: bool | None = None, _cli_ignore_unknown_args: bool | None = None, _cli_kebab_case: bool | None = None, _cli_shortcuts: Mapping[str, str | list[str]] | None = None, _secrets_dir: PathType | None = None, *, rpm: int | None = None, rps: int | None = None, max_concurrency: int | None = None, max_batch_size: int = 50, openai_api_key: SecretStr | None = None, openai_endpoint: HttpUrl = 'https://api.openai.com/v1', openai_model: str = 'gpt-3.5-turbo', openai_temperature: float = 0.1, default_prompt_template: str = 'Translate the following text from {source_lang} to {target_lang}. Return only the translated text, without any additional explanations or quotes.\n\nText to translate: "{text}"')[源代码]

基类：BaseSettings, BaseEngineConfig

OpenAI 引擎的配置模型。

model_config: ClassVar[SettingsConfigDict] = {'arbitrary_types_allowed': True, 'case_sensitive': False, 'cli_avoid_json': False, 'cli_enforce_required': False, 'cli_exit_on_error': True, 'cli_flag_prefix_char': '-', 'cli_hide_none_type': False, 'cli_ignore_unknown_args': False, 'cli_implicit_flags': False, 'cli_kebab_case': False, 'cli_parse_args': None, 'cli_parse_none_str': None, 'cli_prefix': '', 'cli_prog_name': None, 'cli_shortcuts': None, 'cli_use_class_docs_for_groups': False, 'enable_decoding': True, 'env_file': None, 'env_file_encoding': None, 'env_ignore_empty': False, 'env_nested_delimiter': None, 'env_nested_max_split': None, 'env_parse_enums': None, 'env_parse_none_str': None, 'env_prefix': 'TH_', 'extra': 'ignore', 'json_file': None, 'json_file_encoding': None, 'nested_model_default_partial_update': False, 'protected_namespaces': ('model_validate', 'model_dump', 'settings_customise_sources'), 'secrets_dir': None, 'toml_file': None, 'validate_default': True, 'yaml_config_section': None, 'yaml_file': None, 'yaml_file_encoding': None}

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

CONTEXT_MODEL

OpenAIContext 的别名

REQUIRES_SOURCE_LANG: bool = True
ACCEPTS_CONTEXT: bool = True
__init__(config: OpenAIEngineConfig)[源代码]
async initialize() → None[源代码]

引擎的异步初始化钩子，用于设置连接池等。

async close() → None[源代码]

引擎的异步关闭钩子，用于安全释放资源。

提供一个用于开发和测试的调试翻译引擎。
